title: The Myth of Music - music and memories of family

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Harper uses literary elements and techniques to develop the relationship between music and the speaker’s complex memories of her family.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Harper uses literary elements and techniques to develop the relationship between music and the speaker’s complex memories of her family.

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
